title: Layering technique for achieving pinhole-free organic-inorganic halide perovskite thin films through vapor-solid reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00320A, Paper
Lixin Zhang, Jialing Zhong, Anqi Kong, Yuanyuan Chen, Junshuai Fan, Qiang Tan, Yong Peng, Guijie Liang, Zhiliang Ku
Achieving a high-quality organic-inorganic halide perovskite thin film is essential for the fabrication of high-efficiency perovskite solar cells. To enhance the crystalline quality of perovskite thin films, various strategies have...
